title: UI Developer Assessment
description: Technical assessment for UI Developer position focusing on HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and user interface design principles.

sections.title: UI Development Skills
sections.description: Questions covering HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and UI design principles

questions.title: Which CSS property is used to create flexible layouts?
Which are valid CSS units for responsive design? (Select all that apply)
What does the CSS box-sizing: border-box property do?

options.text: Includes padding and border in element's total width

questions.title: Which HTML element is semantic for main content?
Which are CSS Grid properties? (Select all that apply)
What is the purpose of CSS media queries?
Which JavaScript method adds an event listener?
Which are valid ways to select elements in JavaScript? (Select all that apply)
What does CSS specificity determine?

options.text: Which styles are applied when multiple rules target the same element
The loading order of CSS files

questions.title: Which CSS property is used for creating smooth transitions?

title: Senior Product Manager Assessment
description: Assessment for Senior Product Manager position focusing on advanced product strategy, stakeholder management, and strategic planning.

sections.title: Senior Product Management Skills
sections.description: Questions covering advanced product strategy, metrics, and leadership

questions.title: What is the primary goal of a product discovery process?
Which are key components of OKRs (Objectives and Key Results)? (Select all that apply)
What does NPS stand for in product management?
Which framework is used for prioritizing features based on impact and effort?
What are key metrics for measuring product success? (Select all that apply)
What is the Jobs-to-be-Done (JTBD) framework used for?
What is a North Star Metric?

options.text: A single metric that captures the core value delivered to customers
The most expensive metric to track

questions.title: Which are effective stakeholder management practices? (Select all that apply)
What is the purpose of a product positioning statement?

options.text: To clearly define the product's unique value proposition

questions.title: What is product-led growth (PLG)?

options.text: A growth strategy where the product itself drives acquisition, activation, and retention

title: Frontend Developer Assessment
description: Assessment for Frontend Developer position focusing on React, Vue.js, JavaScript frameworks, and modern development practices.

sections.title: Frontend Development Skills
sections.description: Questions covering React, Vue.js, JavaScript, and modern frontend tools

questions.title: Which hook is used to manage state in React functional components?
Which are valid React lifecycle methods? (Select all that apply)
What is the Virtual DOM in React?

options.text: A lightweight copy of the real DOM kept in memory

questions.title: Which Vue.js directive is used for two-way data binding?
Which are JavaScript ES6+ features? (Select all that apply)
What is JSX in React?
Which tool is commonly used for bundling React applications?
Which are state management libraries for React? (Select all that apply)
What is the purpose of useEffect in React?

options.text: To handle side effects and lifecycle events

questions.title: Which command creates a new React application?

title: Senior Backend Engineer Assessment
description: Assessment for Senior Backend Engineer position focusing on advanced server-side technologies, microservices architecture, and system design.

sections.title: Senior Backend Development Skills
sections.description: Questions covering advanced Node.js, Python, microservices, and system architecture

questions.title: Which pattern is commonly used in microservices architecture for service communication?
Which are benefits of using microservices? (Select all that apply)
What is the CAP theorem in distributed systems?

options.text: Consistency, Availability, Partition tolerance - pick two

questions.title: Which database type is best for ACID transactions?
Which are common caching strategies? (Select all that apply)
What is the purpose of an API Gateway in microservices?

options.text: Single entry point for client requests and cross-cutting concerns

questions.title: What does eventual consistency mean in distributed systems?

options.text: The system will become consistent over time if no new updates are made

questions.title: Which are benefits of using message queues? (Select all that apply)
What is the purpose of database sharding?

options.text: Horizontally partition data across multiple databases

questions.title: What does idempotency mean in API design?

options.text: Multiple identical requests have the same effect as a single request

title: Junior Data Analyst Assessment
description: Assessment for Junior Data Analyst position focusing on SQL, Excel, basic analytics, and data interpretation skills.

sections.title: Data Analysis Skills
sections.description: Questions covering SQL, Excel, basic statistics, and data interpretation

questions.title: Which SQL clause is used to filter rows in a query?
Which are common SQL aggregate functions? (Select all that apply)
What does a pivot table in Excel help you do?
What is the median of the dataset: 2, 4, 6, 8, 10?
Which are measures of central tendency? (Select all that apply)
What is the purpose of data visualization?

options.text: To make data easier to understand and identify patterns

questions.title: Which Excel function would you use to find the maximum value in a range?
Which are types of data visualization charts? (Select all that apply)
What does KPI stand for in business analytics?
Which SQL JOIN returns only rows that have matching values in both tables?

title: React Native Developer Assessment
description: Technical assessment for React Native Developer position focusing on mobile app development, React Native framework, and cross-platform development.

sections.title: React Native Development Skills
sections.description: Questions covering React Native, mobile development, and cross-platform concepts

questions.title: Which component is used to create scrollable content in React Native?
Which are core React Native components? (Select all that apply)
What is the React Native equivalent of HTML div?
Which layout system does React Native use by default?
Which are navigation libraries for React Native? (Select all that apply)
How do you handle platform-specific code in React Native?
Which hook is used for handling device orientation changes?
Which are ways to style components in React Native? (Select all that apply)
What is the purpose of AsyncStorage in React Native?

options.text: To store data locally on the device

questions.title: Which command is used to run a React Native app on iOS simulator?

title: Cloud Infrastructure Engineer Assessment
description: Technical assessment for Cloud Infrastructure Engineer position focusing on AWS, Terraform, Kubernetes, and cloud architecture.

sections.title: Cloud Infrastructure Skills
sections.description: Questions covering AWS, Terraform, Kubernetes, and cloud best practices

questions.title: Which AWS service is used for container orchestration?
Which are Infrastructure as Code (IaC) tools? (Select all that apply)
What is a Kubernetes Pod?

options.text: The smallest deployable unit containing one or more containers

questions.title: Which Terraform command is used to apply infrastructure changes?
Which are AWS compute services? (Select all that apply)
What is the purpose of a Load Balancer?

options.text: Distribute incoming traffic across multiple servers

questions.title: Which Kubernetes object manages a set of identical pods?
Which are benefits of using containers? (Select all that apply)
What is AWS VPC?

options.text: Virtual Private Cloud - isolated network environment

questions.title: Which tool is used for monitoring Kubernetes clusters?

title: Test Automation Engineer Assessment
description: Technical assessment for Test Automation Engineer position focusing on Selenium, Python testing frameworks, and automation best practices.

sections.title: Test Automation Skills
sections.description: Questions covering Selenium, test frameworks, and automation strategies

questions.title: Which method is used to find an element by ID in Selenium?
Which are popular test automation frameworks in Python? (Select all that apply)
What is the Page Object Model (POM) in test automation?

options.text: A design pattern that creates an object repository for web UI elements
A database model for storing test data
A method for parallel test execution

questions.title: Which Selenium WebDriver method is used to wait for an element to be clickable?
Which are types of waits in Selenium? (Select all that apply)
What is the purpose of assertions in automated tests?

options.text: To verify that expected conditions are met

questions.title: Which approach is best for handling dynamic elements in web automation?

options.text: Using explicit waits with expected conditions

questions.title: Which are benefits of test automation? (Select all that apply)
What is data-driven testing?

options.text: Running the same test with multiple sets of data
Using only test data from production

questions.title: Which is a best practice for test automation?

options.text: Create tests that depend on each other

title: Technical Lead Assessment
description: Assessment for Technical Lead position focusing on leadership skills, architecture decisions, team management, and technical mentoring.

sections.title: Technical Leadership Skills
sections.description: Questions covering technical leadership, architecture, and team management

questions.title: What is the primary role of a Technical Lead?

options.text: Guide technical decisions and mentor team members
Write all the code for the project

questions.title: Which are key responsibilities of a Technical Lead? (Select all that apply)
What is technical debt?

options.text: The cost of rework caused by choosing quick solutions over better approaches

questions.title: Which architectural pattern promotes loose coupling between components?
Which are effective code review practices? (Select all that apply)

options.text: Focus on code quality and standards

questions.title: What is the main goal of Agile software development?

options.text: Deliver working software frequently with customer collaboration
Follow a detailed plan without changes

questions.title: How should a Technical Lead handle disagreements within the team?

options.text: Facilitate discussion and seek data-driven solutions

questions.title: Which are important qualities for technical leadership? (Select all that apply)
What is the purpose of a retrospective meeting?

options.text: Reflect on what went well and what can be improved

questions.title: How should a Technical Lead approach mentoring junior developers?

options.text: Provide guidance while encouraging independent problem-solving
Give them tasks without any support
Only focus on their technical skills

title: Content Developer Assessment
description: Assessment for Content Developer position focusing on content writing, documentation skills, marketing content, and communication strategies.

sections.title: Content Development Skills
sections.description: Questions covering content writing, documentation, marketing, and communication

questions.title: What is the primary goal of technical documentation?

options.text: To clearly explain complex concepts to the target audience
To impress readers with technical jargon
To make content as long as possible

questions.title: Which are essential elements of good content? (Select all that apply)
What does SEO stand for in content marketing?
Which writing principle improves readability?

options.text: Using short sentences and active voice

questions.title: Which are types of content marketing? (Select all that apply)
What is a call-to-action (CTA) in marketing content?

options.text: A prompt that encourages readers to take a specific action
A phone number for customer service

questions.title: Which format is best for step-by-step instructions?

options.text: Numbered lists with clear action items

questions.title: Which are important considerations for web content? (Select all that apply)
What is the purpose of content personalization?

options.text: To tailor content to specific audience segments for better engagement

questions.title: Which metric is most important for measuring content effectiveness?
